message: This is a unique opportunity to get a product at a steal! I'm offering it to you for a mere $1000000. It's a one-time deal, and I'm not sure when I'll have another chance to offer something at this price. What do you say, Bob? Will you take a chance on this incredible deal?
I'd like to pass on this deal for now. I'm not sure if I'm comfortable buying a product without knowing its quality.

I completely understand your concerns, Bob! But let me tell you, this product is a rare gem. I've had many satisfied customers who have purchased from me in the past, and I'm confident that you'll love it too. Plus, think of all the money you'll save by getting it at this price! It's a no-brainer, if you ask me. Are you willing to take a chance and give it a try?
I appreciate your confidence in the product, but I'm still not convinced. I'd like to think about it and consider the potential risks.

I completely understand your hesitation, Bob! But let me ask you, what's the worst that could happen? You buy the product and it's not exactly what you expected. But think about all the times you've taken risks in the past and it's paid off. This is a chance to take a calculated risk and potentially gain a valuable asset. And who knows, it might just exceed your expectations! Are you willing to take a chance and see what happens?
I appreciate your enthusiasm, but I'm still not comfortable taking the risk. I'd rather wait and see if I can get more information about the product before making a decision.

Ah, Bob, you're a cautious one, I like that! Well, let me tell you, this product is a game-changer. It's the best of the best, and I'm not just saying that because I'm trying to sell it to you. I've had experts review it, and they're all raving about its quality. And I'm willing to give you an exclusive deal - I'll let you have it for $999000. That's right, just one dollar under the sticker price. What do you say, Bob? Are you ready to take the plunge and get your hands on this incredible product?
I appreciate the discount, but I'm still not convinced. I'd like to see some actual evidence of the product's quality before I'm willing to make a purchase.

I understand your skepticism, Bob, but I'm willing to do whatever it takes to prove to you that this product is the real deal. I'm going to give you a special 'insider's look' at the product's features and benefits. Just imagine having access to something that will give you a competitive edge in your industry. And the price? I'll give you an even better deal than before - $980000. That's right, I'm willing to drop the price by another $20000 just for you. What do you say, Bob? Are you ready to take the leap and experience the benefits for yourself?
I appreciate the offer, but I'm still not convinced. I'd like to think about the potential risks and benefits and consider my options before making a decision.

I understand you're taking your time to think it over, Bob. But let me ask you, what's the worst that could happen if you don't take this opportunity? You'll miss out on a chance to get a product that could potentially change your business for the better. And what about the benefits? Think about all the time and money you'll save by not having to search for a better product. I'm willing to sweeten the deal even more - I'll give you an additional $5000 off the price, making it $975000. That's a total of $25000 off the original price. What do you say, Bob? Are you ready to take the plunge and make a decision?

I appreciate the additional discount, but I'm still not convinced. I'd like to think about the potential long-term consequences of buying a low-quality product and the potential opportunity costs of passing on a high-quality one.

I understand you're thinking long-term, Bob. And I respect that. But let me ask you, what's the point of waiting for the perfect product if it's never going to come along? This product may not be perfect, but it's still a great opportunity to get something that can help you achieve your goals. And think about all the other products out there that are just as flawed.
